articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Global inflows help Indian stocks become EM Asia’s top gainers - The Economic Times
articles.description: Foreign investors have increased inflows into Indian stocks to a nine-month high in May. They purchased a net $5bn of the countrys shares last month, the most since August, according to Bloomberg. The purchases continued for 24 consecutive days, the longest s…
articles.content: Foreign inflows into Indian stocks accelerated to a nine-month high in May as investors sought to capitalize on one of the fastest growth rates among major economies.Overseas investors purchased a ne… [+1109 chars]
